items.title: 67 believed dead after American Airlines plane collides with Army helicopter
items.content: An American Airlines regional jet collided with a helicopter near Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport.

items.title: Deadly American Airlines-helicopter collision highlights concerns with crowded U.S. airspace

items.title: American Airlines collision with Army helicopter is worst U.S. air disaster since 2001

items.title: Trump and Musk called for former Starliner astronauts to return 'as soon as possible.' Here's what NASA planned.

items.title: Super Bowl ads beckon up to $8 million apiece for Fox
